thread.section_title: One.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of One.com | www.one.com
thread.title: Dan Wilson

author: Dan Wilson
title: Dan Wilson
text:
I've been using one.com for various web hosting and emailing for a number of years... but their email services have been quite problematic lately.
For example, there have been 9 incidents reported and confirmed in February 2017 - all are available to see on their server status page.
Everything else (setting up, support questions, closing) has been fine. It's just that I use their email system more than the web hosting and I kind of need it to work for my business.
